verbs.description: roman reigns stuns fans by [V: relinquishing] [ARG1: his wwe championship belt] [ARGM-LOC: on - air] as he has been suffering from leukaemia the 33-year - old real name leati joseph anoa'i is one of the biggest wwe superstars and he revealed on monday that he was first diagnosed with leukaemia in 2007 and has suffered a relapse that will require treatment he relinquished his belt live on - air in a heartfelt speech john cena leati joseph anoa'i leati joseph anoai leukemia leukaemia wwe roman reigns wwe championship roman reigns
